page.title: 08LOCAL SERVICES IN CHINGFORD
page.content: {MEALS ON WHEELS People take meals to the old people who are unable to cook for themselves. If the meals were not taken old people might starve. {DOCTORS } There are lots of doctors and their surgeries.The doctor gives us prescri- ptions. {SOCIAL SERVICES We need social services for many dif- ferent reasons like court cases,to see people who are in prison,seeing soli- citers and supporting needy families. {DUSTMEN } Dustmen make a weekly clean,keeping disease and rats away. {POLICE Police uphold the law,helping us find lost property or people.They deal with court cases and prison.
